summary.p: Converts a given value to its equivalent string representation.

examples.p: The following shows TO_STRING results for some input data:
examples.sampleCode: SELECT 'The TO_STRING result of value NULL is: ' AS Input, TO_STRING(NULL) AS Value UNION ALL SELECT 'The TO_STRING result of value true is: ' AS Input, TO_STRING(true) AS Value UNION ALL SELECT 'The TO_STRING result of value 4711 is: ' AS Input, TO_STRING(4711) AS Value UNION ALL SELECT 'The TO_STRING result of value 4711.007 is: ' AS Input, TO_STRING(4711.007) AS Value UNION ALL SELECT 'The TO_STRING result of value 4711.007e65 is: ' AS Input, TO_STRING(4711.007e65) AS Value UNION ALL SELECT 'The TO_STRING result of value ''String'' is: ' AS Input, TO_STRING('String') AS Value UNION ALL SELECT 'The TO_STRING result of value GETDATE() is: ' AS Input, TO_STRING(GETDATE()) AS Value
